question: This Veda was composed of "formulas and spells intended to counteract diseases and calamities".To which of the following Vedas,the above mentioned sentence refer ?
explanation: According to Monier Williams, the Veda is named after the mythical priest Atharvan who was first person  to develop prayers to fire, offer Soma, and hence wrote  "formulas and spells intended to counteract diseases and calamities".
